data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Leninabad, Tajikistan. Please, stir the 1,374 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Leninabad, Tajikistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Leninabad, Tajikistan.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Leninabad, Tajikistan.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Leninabad, Tajikistan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tajik people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Leninabad.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,374 believers in Leninabad, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Leninabad, Tajikistan that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Leninabad
location.people_groups_list: Hazara, Tatar, Parsee, Ghami, Romani, Domari
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hazara (1,700), Tatar (7,800), Parsee (2,600), Ghami (31,000), Romani, Domari (3,100)
